title: kaNDAyO sakhiyE
sahitya:
kaNDAyO sakhiyE en azhaganaik-kaNDAyO sakhiyE


anupallavi

  daNDAmaraik-kaNNAl uNDen manadai ippO tiNDADa viTTengO kanrOTTit-tirigirAn


caraNam    anbaraik-kai viDEn enbadai marandAnO akaTa vikaTamellAm yAriDam payinrAnO
inbamAga vanden idayattil viLaiyADi EmATrip-pOna Atma rAman parandAmanaik-
